2 from dynamic_reconfigure.server import Server
3 from bitbots_vision_tools.cfg import ColorTestConfig
4 from bitbots_vision.vision_modules import color
5 from sensor_msgs.msg import Image
6 from cv_bridge import CvBridge
7 import rospy
8 import rospkg
9 import cv2
10 import os.path

12 
13 class ColorTest:
14 
15  def __init__(self):
16  rospack = rospkg.RosPack()
17  self.package_path = rospack.get_path('bitbots_vision_tools')
18 
19  # ROS-Stuff:
20  rospy.init_node('bitbots_vision_color_test')
21 
22  self.bridge = CvBridge()
23 
24  self.config = {}
25 
26  # Register publisher for 'color_tester_hsv_mask_image'-messages
27  self.pub_hsv_mask_image = rospy.Publisher(
28  'color_tester_hsv_mask',
29  Image)
30 
31  srv = Server(ColorTestConfig, self._dynamic_reconfigure_callback)
32 
33  rospy.spin()
34 
35  def _image_callback(self, image_msg):
36  self.handle_image(image_msg)
37 
38  def handle_image(self, image_msg):
39  # converting the ROS image message to CV2-image
40  image = self.bridge.imgmsg_to_cv2(image_msg, "bgr8")
41 
42  # mask (and publish) image
43  self.color_detector.mask_image(image)
44 
45  def _dynamic_reconfigure_callback(self, config, level):
46  self.color_detector = color.HsvSpaceColorDetector(config, "color_test", self.pub_hsv_mask_image)
47 
48  # subscriber of camera image:
49  if 'img_msg_topic' not in self.config or \
50  self.config['img_msg_topic'] != config['img_msg_topic'] or \
51  'img_queue_size' not in self.config or \
52  self.config['img_queue_size'] != config['img_queue_size']:
53  if hasattr(self, 'image_sub'):
54  self.image_sub.unregister()
55  self.image_sub = rospy.Subscriber(
56  config['img_msg_topic'],
57  Image,
58  self._image_callback,
59  queue_size=config['img_queue_size'],
60  tcp_nodelay=True,
61  buff_size=60000000)
62  # https://github.com/ros/ros_comm/issues/536
63 
64  self.config = config
65  return config
66 
67 if __name__ == "__main__":
68  ColorTest()
